ðŸ“– Summary: WorkWell is an iOS application that leverages AirPods motion sensors to monitor head posture in real-time. It provides real-time feedback and session tracking to help users improve their posture and build better work habits. The app detects poor posture based on head pitch thresholds and offers visual feedback to encourage users to maintain a healthy posture.
